author: Luc Olinga
title: Crypto Bros Are Winning Big in Trump’s America
description: The industry that brought you Bitcoin casinos and NFT grifts is now riding high on regulation, respectability, and record profits thanks to the White House.
content:
Six months into Donald Trumps return to the White House, one thing is clear: the biggest winners so far arent oil executives or Wall Street bankers. Theyre crypto bros.
Yes, the same industry that m… [+4799 chars]

reworded_description:
The Trump administration has been the first to impose new regulations on the business community and to take steps that could threaten the entire industry.

It's not just the Trump administration that has been imposing new regulations. The industry has been hit hard by the regulation that the Trump administration was pushing. This is not a coincidence, as the White House has been pushing to impose new regulations on the industry and to take steps that could threaten the entire industry.

reworded_content:
This one's interesting. It seems like the only thing that could be going wrong for the Trump team is a lack of credibility.
So, how can you avoid this?
First, you need to get yourself on the right side of history. It's easy to do that, but it's not always easy.
Now, when you see Trump, you'll be forced to look at his "favorites."
